description: This table stores a member's Medicare eligibility reason information.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MCARE_ELIG_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Medicare eligibility reason category ID for the member.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Age


Disabled without ESRD


ESRD only


Disabled with ESRD


None of the above

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: The start date corresponding to the Medicare eligibility reason.

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: The end date corresponding to the Medicare eligibility reason.
